1701225600000.answer: ArcelorMittal has implemented strict safety protocols, including regular training sessions and personal protective equipment for all workers.
Emergency drills and hazard assessments are conducted frequently to ensure a safe working environment.

1700457600000.answer: Workers are trained to follow standard operating procedures and use the latest safety equipment.
ArcelorMittal also provides on-site medical assistance in case of emergencies.

1693699200000.answer: Employees can grow through leadership development programs and mentorship initiatives.
The company offers opportunities for lateral moves across departments to broaden skills.

1692921600000.answer: ArcelorMittal provides scholarships and further education opportunities for career growth.
Employees can attend technical training programs to enhance their expertise.

1717180800000.answer: Environmental challenges include managing carbon emissions and minimizing industrial waste.
Water and energy conservation are also major focus areas in the steel industry.

1712092800000.answer: ArcelorMittal has invested in carbon capture technology to address emissions.
They also focus on using renewable energy sources in their operations.

1696032000000.answer: The company produces flat steel, long steel, and steel tubes for various industries.
Specialty steels, such as automotive and electrical steels, are also part of their portfolio.

1697846400000.answer: Their flat steel products are widely used in the automotive and construction industries.
Galvanized steel sheets and coils are among their best-sellers.

1708012800000.answer: ArcelorMittal holds approximately 6% of the global steel market share.
It is the largest steel producer in the world by volume.

1702944000000.answer: ArcelorMittal competes by continuously investing in innovation and efficiency.
Strategic partnerships and acquisitions strengthen its market position.
